# Station Alert - Violet
[italic]Called by: A viral threat aboard the station.[/italic]
[bold]Conditions:[/bold]
There is a known viral threat aboard the station, and all hands on deck are required to combat it.
[bold]General Crew:[/bold]
All requirements of Red Alert also apply.
All personnel are required to maximize their Suit Sensors.
Personnel are recommended to distance themselves from other personnel where infection or carrier status is suspected.
All personnel are required to wear a facial covering, such as a surgical mask or gas mask, for the duration of the alert. Failure to do so is Failure to Comply and Endangerment.
All personnel are strongly advised to enable suit internals for the duration of the alert.
All personnel are required to dispose of any zombified bodies or tumors through incineration or spacing. Doing such is not considered a Prevention of Revival
